display.title: Acquire: techreborn:industrial_blast_furnace
description: A multi-block machine used to smelt tough metals.
It has an input rate of 512 E/tick and an internal buffer for 40.000 E.
The smelting abilities depends on the casings used for the multi-block.
The Blast Furnace requires a 3Ã—4 multi-block with a hole in the center. The Multi-block can be built from different machine casings. Possible options are:
This will result in heat being produced inside the furnace and thus have the ability to smelt the toughest ores (this however depends on the type of casing used).

subtitle.text: A multi-block machine used to smelt tough metals.
